newsitem.title: USA: Primadonna not to expand into Mississippi.
newsitem.headline: Primadonna not to expand into Mississippi.

text.p: Primadonna Resorts Inc said on Tuesday that it decided not to pursue plans to expand into the Biloxi, Mississippi gaming market at this time.

The company said in a statement that, after a period of due diligence, and despite an extremely positive association with local regulators and officials, it will not enter into a definitive agreement to purchase the Broadwater Resort site in Biloxi or President Casinos Inc's leasehold interest at the Broadwater Marina.
Primadonna signed a letter of intent to buy the properties in July.
Primadonna said it remains convinced of Biloxi's potential as a major resort destination, but the timing is not right at this time for Primadonna.
